overview: Mr.Peter Van Laanen brings to Albeo more than 30 years of research and product development in the fields of medical electronics, magnetic and optical data storage, and fiber optical communication. He has 12 patents in the fields of medical equipment, data storage, and electro-optics. He has held management positions at Storage Technology, Infineon and Picolight as well as several smaller startup companies and holds a BSEE and MSEE from the University of Wisconsin in Madison.
